en.name: Paul Liew

photo.alt: Photo of Paul Liew, Keng Eng Kee

en.quote: I grew my delivery sales by 40%. I also discovered room for growth in my weekday lunch sales, and since switching on the engine, my reservation covers for lunch have gone up by 30%.

en.name: Yuan Xin
en.quote: I've tripled my delivery sales. The extra revenue I've made more than pays for Oddle. I hope Oddle keeps making more money from me because it means I'll be making even more too!

my.name: Roberto Guiati
my.quote: Oddle has been a fantastic solution for our business. It has helped us save costs while streamlining our operations, making it easier to manage orders efficiently. I appreciate how it allows us to focus more on growing the brand and serving our customers better.

my.name: Nor Arieni Adriena

photo.alt: Photo of Nor Arieni Adriena, Gula Cakery

my.quote: Oddle has truly been a one-stop center for all our business needs. It has not only helped us grow our customer database but also boosted our sales for both dine-in and delivery. The data-driven marketing engagement provided by Oddle has been instrumental in connecting with our customers more effectively and driving meaningful results for our brand.

my.name: Jaslyn Rangson

photo.alt: Photo of Jaslyn Rangson, Jaslyn Cakes

my.quote: Oddle Shop has been a game-changer for our business. It's incredibly helpful in streamlining our orders and improving productivity, allowing us to focus on delivering the best experience to our customers. Most importantly, it has significantly contributed to growing our sales. We couldn't be happier with the results!
